Plot: A young British girl born and raised in India loses her neglectful parents in an earthquake. She is returned to England to live at her uncle's estate. Her uncle is very distant due to the ...
Title: The Secret Garden
Actors: Kate Maberly, Heydon Prowse, Andrew Knott, Maggie Smith
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 3 wins & 5 nominations.
